import sys

def solution(num):
    i = 1
    j = 1
    cnt = 0
    while num > 1:
        if i == j:
            i += 1
            num -= 1
            cnt += 1
        elif i > j:
            j += 1
            num -= 1
            cnt += 1
        elif i < j:
            i += 1
            num -= 1
            cnt += 1
        print(i, j)
    print(cnt)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    solution(n)

while x*y < N:

        y += 1
